Shraddha Kapoor Wiki | Biography | Movies | Family | Salary | Height

Bolly Reporter
7 months ago

Shraddha Kapoor is an Indian actress and singer who work in Hindi films. Furthermore, she is one of the highest-paid actresses in India. She is the daughter of actor Shakti Kapoor and Shivangi Kapoor. She also accompanied her father to various shooting locations in her childhood.

During one of David Dhawan’s shoots, Shraddha becomes a friend of actor Varun Dhawan, to play with him, and they were holding a torch pretending it to be a camera while delivering film lines to each other and they were also dancing to Govinda’s film songs.

Biography & Wiki

Shraddha Kapoor’s nickname is Chirkoot. She was born on 3 March 1987 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 32 years. Shraddha’s Zodiac is Pisces. Her hometown is Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Her nationality is Indian.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Shraddha Kapoor’s height in feet is 5’ 5”. Also, her height in Centimeters is 165 cm.

Family Members

Shraddha Kapoor is the daughter of actor Shakti Kapoor and Shivangi Kapoor. On her father’s side, Shraddha is of Punjabi descent, and on her mother’s side, she is of Marathi ancestry. Her elder brother’s name is Siddhanth Kapoor who is also an Actor and a Director.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Shraddha had a relationship with actor and co-star Aditya Roy. It was rumored that Shraddha dated with actor and director Farhan Akhtar after their movie Rock On 2.

Shraddha currently in a serious relationship with Photographer Rohan Shrestha, and they are also planning to marry.

Education and School, College

Shraddha Kapoor completed her schooling at Jamnabai Narsee School and at the age of 15. After that, she shifted to the American School of Bombay, where she was a schoolmate with actress Athiya Shetty and actor Tiger Shroff. She joined Boston University, the USA for her graduation, but she dropped off before completing the course.

Salary and Net Worth

Shraddha has an estimated net worth of almost $8 million. She earns almost Rs.4 to 10 crores for every movie she plays. The Mercedes ML was the very first car that Shraddha bought with her own money, after the success of the film ‘Ek Villain’. Shraddha Kapoor also owns a Mini Cooper and Mercedes Benz. She has one house in Juhu, another sub-urban area in Mud Island and the third in Lonavla near Mumbai. She is a big fan of watches and footwear, who has a huge collection of gold and silver watches and also has a collection of Jimmy Choo footwear and Gucci perfumes.

Shraddha Kapoor Filmography

Shraddha Kapoor began her acting career with a brief role in the 2010 heist film Teen Patti alongside Amitabh Bachchan, Ben Kingsley, and R. Madhavan. Her first leading role in the teen drama Luv Ka The End (2011).

In 2013, Shraddha Kapoor found her breakthrough role in Mohit Suri’s romantic musical drama Aashiqui 2, the sequel to the 1990 film Aashiqui. She was cast as Aarohi Keshav Shirke, a small-town bar singer who becomes a successful playback artist with the help of a popular male singer (played by Aditya Roy Kapur). The film was a major box office success with global revenue of ₹1.09 billion (US$17 million).

She has been worked many Popular & commercial successful Movies including Ek Villain, Ungli, ABCD 2, Baaghi, A Flying Jatt, Rock On 2, Ok Jaanu and Half Girlfriend & Haseena.

Awards & Recognition

Shraddha received Several Awards & Nominations her acting performance.

  • She got “Stardust Awards” for Best Actress in 2012.
  • In 2014 she Grabs the “Lions Gold Awards” for “New Heartthrob Film Actor in Lead Role – Female”.
  • She received “Global Indian Music Academy Awards” for “Best Celebrity Singer of the Year”.

Facts about Shraddha Kapoor

  • Shraddha Kapoor is now the highest-paid Celebrities of Bollywood.
  • In 2016, she was featured among the highest-paid actresses of Bollywood with a total earning of ₹50 million (US$770,000) per film.
  • In 2018, Eastern Eye featured her as one of the eight sexiest women in Bollywood.
  • She was a scholar and scored around 95% in her 12th standard exams.
  • She is a trained singer; her mother and maternal grandfather are also trained, classical singers.
  • She is addicted to tea.
  • When she was 16 years old, Salman Khan offered her a role after he saw her play at the Boston University, but at that time she was not ready for acting.

Controversies

In 2014, photographers boycotted her during the success party of Ek Villain, due to her bad behavior with the press media during the promotions of Ek Villain.
